originalText.text: I had a horrible time at this .as soon I walked in the assumed I was a woman, and the owner and some black guy was very discriminate against me. Ask me if I buying something,  then threw me out. I filings a complaint against the store.

originalText.text:
I have never been so offended in my life. My first experience was not good as I heard the employees talking about me saying I was taking too long looking at underwear. I felt very uncomfortable continuing to look and shop so I just left.
The second time I was watched by the staff and the man at the door. He came over and asked if we needed help. He was impatient and rushed us. We still needed more items but was ignored when we asked for something ljt of the glass case. This place is trashy. I will never go back.

The second time I was watched by the staff and the man at the door. He came over and asked if we needed help. He was impatient and rushed us. We still needed more items but was ignored when we asked for something ljt of the glass case. This place is trashy. I will never go back.

originalText.text:
There are alot of swimsuits and intimates to choose from and naturally one would need time to select the right things, but the staff made me feel VERY uncomfortable while I was shopping because they hawk you relentlessly. They literally just stand there and watch you looking for underwear and intimates and its distracting. It's like your on a time limit in the store.
Then I was "escorted" to the cash register by an employee who then proceeded to hawk me in a threatening manner while I made my purchases.
I have no ideawhy, but it was clear they really thought i was shoplifting, which 8 was not and I will absolutely be willing to submit to a polygraph test to prove this.

NEVER AGAIN.

originalText.text: This place was on my bucket list to just see and review about but not now. One of my good friend went in there just to be told to leave cuz they took a bit longer to shop cuz they made it a day trip. They don't live close so they where taking there time. But this guy thinking he's big man not even security kick them out because they were having too much fun and didn't think they would buy anything. That being considering quite sad because outside is literally rainbows what a shame. Maybe hire people that don't kick out ur paying customers.
